snippet: The Pentagon needs to do a lot more to halt sexual abuses and ensure justice for victims in the military.
abstract: Editorial cites reports that find the rate of sexual assault on American women serving in the military remains intolerably high; disputes claims by the Pentagon that it can reform itself and calls on Congress to legislate reform, despite the perils of civilian intrusion in the military.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon needs to do a lot more to halt sexual abuses and ensure justice for victims in the military.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
